
       Name: Test case 4
Description: Test wrong number of db items error
       File: testdata/errors-example/case4.yaml

Request:
     Method: GET
       Path: /json
      Query: 
       Body:
<no body>

Response:
     Status: 200 OK
       Body:
{"somefield":123}
       Db Request #1:
SELECT *
       Db Response #1:
{"field1":"value1"}
{"field2":123}


     Result: ERRORS!

Errors:

1) quantity of items in database do not match:
     expected: 1
       actual: 2

   query: SELECT *
   diff (--- expected vs +++ actual):
 [
+ "{\"field1\":\"value1\"}",
  "{\"field2\":123}",
 ]
